projects.title: Battle of Herone
projects.description: Strategy game with card system and tactical battles, published on Steam. All gameplay, unit system, cards, progression, and battle logic were developed from scratch, with asynchronous multiplayer based on API and database.
projects.longDescription:
Battle of Herone is a strategy game focused on tactical battles using cards to summon units and control the field. The entire project was created entirely by me: gameplay, card system, battle logic, economy, UI, maps, procedural art, internal tools, and Steam integration.

The multiplayer model is **asynchronous**, without real-time networking. Instead of direct connections between players, the game uses API + database to register states, send actions, process battle results, and maintain player progress. This format eliminates the need for dedicated servers and ensures fast, secure, and stable matches.

Technically, the project includes:
- Complete card system (cost, rarity, attributes, effects, archetypes).
- Fully original combat mechanics, with unit AI, movement, range, and target prioritization.
- Deck management, progression, economy, and rewards.
- Asynchronous backend via API, match control, result storage, and data persistence.
- Internal tools in Unity for creating and balancing units.
- Complete publication on Steamworks.

In my professional assessment, this project demonstrates total mastery of the essential layers of a commercial game: design, implementation, asynchronous multiplayer flow, content production, platform integration, and general stability. The natural next steps would be balancing telemetry, seasonal events, and content expansion (new factions, cards, and modes).

projects.title: Forklift Simulator
projects.description: Realistic simulator for forklift operator training.
projects.longDescription: I developed a forklift simulator to train operators in a safe virtual environment. The system simulates realistic physics, forklift control, collisions, and load handling tasks. This project is aimed at corporate and educational training.

projects.title: Mists of Krakovia: The Great Collapse
projects.description: MMORPG created in 1 month as part of a game jam.
projects.longDescription: During a game jam, we developed Mists of Krakovia: The Great Collapse, an MMORPG with open-world mechanics, combat, and progression. The speed of the project required efficient design, rapid prototyping, and extensible architecture, and allowed exploring mission systems, inventory, and networking on a reduced scale.

projects.title: Launcher — Mists of Krakovia
projects.description: Professional launcher developed in Unity with UI Toolkit, responsible for automatically downloading and updating the latest version of the MMORPG Mists of Krakovia.
projects.longDescription: This launcher was created to manage the entire update flow of Mists of Krakovia. Built in Unity using UI Toolkit, it connects to files hosted on GitHub Pages to check for the latest client version, download updates, apply patches, and ensure the player always has the most up-to-date version. The system includes automatic version checking, download with progress bar, file validation, extraction, and safe replacement of game data, inspired by the experience of professional MMORPG launchers like Albion and WoW.
features: Interface built with Unity UI Toolkit
Automatic version checking using manifest.json hosted on GitHub Pages
Game update download directly from GitHub Pages
Visual progress system with download and verification status
Automatic extraction and update of the game client
Fallback for complete reinstallation if the current patch fails
Design inspired by major MMORPG launchers

projects.title: Orbit - Project & Team Management
projects.description: A comprehensive SaaS dashboard for project management and time tracking. Currently in development, it features interactive Kanban boards, client CRM, and detailed productivity analytics.
projects.longDescription: Orbit is an ambitious project currently under development (targeted for 2026) designed to solve the fragmentation of productivity tools. The goal is to build a unified platform where agencies can manage tasks, track billable hours, and organize client data in one place. The application utilizes a modern stack with React and Tailwind CSS to deliver a responsive and visually striking 'Dark Mode' interface. Key features being implemented include a drag-and-drop Kanban board, real-time dashboard analytics for workload tracking, and an integrated timesheet system. This project showcases advanced frontend state management and complex UI component architecture.

projects.title: POS - Point of Sale
projects.description: POS system developed to explore and validate modern frontend and backend practices using React, Supabase, and Tailwind. The project simulates a complete point of sale with authentication, product registration, and optimized operational flow.
projects.longDescription: This project was created with the objective of reproducing a functional Point of Sale (POS), applying in practice modern technologies that I consider essential for building fast, robust, and scalable web applications. On the frontend, I used React with Vite to ensure excellent performance and a clear modular structure. With TailwindCSS, I developed a clean, responsive, and easy-to-evolve interface. On the backend, Supabase was chosen for the combination of PostgreSQL, authentication, and real-time APIs, which allowed quickly implementing the complete POS flow — including login, product management, and sales structure. This project serves as a solid proof of concept, demonstrating how to integrate these tools efficiently while maintaining a clean architecture, ready for future expansions like inventory control, administrative dashboards, and integrations with physical devices.

projects.title: DreamSelfie - AI Avatar Generator
projects.description: An interactive platform utilizing Generative AI to transform user selfies into stylized avatars (Cyberpunk, 3D, Retro), featuring a modern and immersive interface.
projects.longDescription: DreamSelfie is an application developed to democratize access to AI-generated art through a simplified and visually striking UX. The project focuses on a 'Mobile-First' experience, guiding the user through an intuitive flow: photo upload, artistic style selection (such as '80s Retro', 'Action Figure', 'Clay Animation'), and image generation. The interface utilizes a neon color palette and dark mode to create a futuristic atmosphere. Behind the fluid interface built with React and Tailwind, the application integrates diffusion model APIs to process transformations in real-time, demonstrating competence in complex API integration and responsive interface design.
